job.title: Machine Learning Engineer, Creative Center
job.description: ltpgtTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video and aims to inspire creativity and bring joy Launched in over 150 markets and in 75 languages TikTok has global offices including Mountain View Los Angeles New York London Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and TokyoltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for Machine Learning Engineers to join our TikTok Creative Center Creative Center is committed to driving the technology upgrade in adtech and creative industry focusing on developing solutions for creative production interpretation and optimization The team leads the innovation in creativetech areas and has made great progressltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt1 Responsible for the development of machine learning creation service of ad systemltpgtltpgt2 Understand product objectives help developing a scalable and reliable system aligned with product target and requirementsltpgtltpgt3 Closely follow the most uptodate technologies improve the autogeneration effect of ad materials such as title video photo music etcltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtltspan classqlcursorgtltspangtltstronggtltpgtltpgt1 Bachelors degree or above majoring in Computer Science or related fieldsltpgtltpgt2 Demonstrated knowledge of machine learning technologyCVNLPltpgtltpgt3 Passion for new technologies and proven capability in analysis and problemsolvingltpgtltpgt4 Good team worker communication skills and project management experience is preferredltpgt
